mutants.code:
def calculate_average_score(scores):
    if len(scores) <= 4:
        return 0
    scores.sort()
    trimmed_scores = scores[1:-1]
    average_score = round(sum(trimmed_scores) / len(trimmed_scores))
    return average_score

    trimmed_scores = scores[1:-1]
    average_score = round(sum(trimmed_scores) / len(trimmed_scores))
    return average_score
